definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The wedding banquet, remove the drinks do costs 13208 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 此次办婚宴，除去酒水共花费13208元。

sentences.english: The next is to point dish and call for drinks.
sentences.chinese: 接下来是点菜肴，喊酒水。

sentences.english: Free libations , holiday revelers, and of course, fireworks abound.
sentences.chinese: 免费的酒水，节日狂欢者，当然还有礼花燃放。

sentences.english: Please show me a wine list.
All cocktails are individual priced and subject to 15% service charge.
sentences.chinese: 详细价格请参照酒水牌，另需加15%服务费。

sentences.english: Did is you order, enjoy your self, please.
There is corkage fee for brought in liquors.
sentences.chinese: 自带酒水是要收开瓶费的。

sentences.english: Single drink, enjoy half-price for concession cup.
sentences.chinese: 单杯饮料或酒水，续杯享受半价优惠。

sentences.english: Maintain complete knowledge of all beverage selections, correct glassware and garnishes in the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 熟知餐厅的酒水及相应的杯子和装金饰。

sentences.english: Why do some drinks than regular channel cheap so much?
sentences.chinese: 为什么有的酒水比正规渠道便宜那么多？

sentences.english: The restaurant didn't have a liquor licence, but they allowed you to brown bag.
sentences.chinese: 那家馆子没有酒牌，不过允许客人自带酒水。

sentences.english: Some restaurants allow you to take your own wine and just charge you corkage.
sentences.chinese: 有些餐厅允许顾客自带酒水，只收些开瓶费。
找一个可以自带酒水的场地。
酒水的消耗向主管报告。

sentences.english: There is no corkage fee for brought in liquors.
sentences.chinese: 自带酒水是不收开瓶费的。

definition: tea prepared in large quantity using inexpensive tea leaves
food and drink/food to accompany wine
to have a few drinks/to drink to one's heart's content
